ygData.msgSnippet: Megaton was a Mutant creation of Maximal and Predacon DNA cloning created on earth by Veratis. Until then his only existence was as cells from the transmetal

Megaton was a Mutant creation of Maximal and Predacon DNA cloning created on
earth by Veratis. Until then his only existence was as cells from the
transmetal T-Rex Megatron and a large Maximal dragon named Necromancer.
Since Veratis' past hasn't really been revealed as to where he got the
protoforms he's been "Improving" (Experimenting on with a mutant virus which
removes most signs of a robot form) I'm sure something can be worked out,
maybe have Stallex attacked by a bot resembling Megaton. A resemblance of
his former mode might exist through the DNA replication. This could open a
rivalry between him and a few bots in the game. (Necromancer, Veratis,
Megaton, just to name three.)
Sound OK to you? either that or we'll just say a future temporal anomaly
will send Megaton back in time to when Stallex was young but it hasn't
happened to him yet. (If theres anyone who understands temporal physics
please explain them to me, I'm getting a headache just thinking about it.)
----- Original Message -----
From: <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 16, 2001 11:32 AM
Subject: angry


> Stallex had improved,but his dad was furious and figting harder than
> ever so Stallex was being crushed. Not only had Mustex's plan to
> destroy the "Iron Fist" failed, but his ulterior motives to test his
> strength against Zardus before taking on Megaton(who with permission
> from the owner once attacked Stallex when he was a baby realising the
> advantages of a development period could prove dangerous so will
> whoever owns him please give me permission for that) had also failed
> when he never saw Zardus.
